short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Free adblocker against advertising and pop-ups, for youtube and other popular video websites
short.de: Kostenloser Adblocker gegen Werbung und Pop-ups, für Youtube und andere populäre Video-Websites
short.es: Bloqueador gratuito contra la publicidad y los pop-ups, para youtube y otros sitios de video populares.
short.fr: Bloqueur gratuit contre la publicité et les pop-ups, pour youtube et d'autres sites vidéo populaires
short.it: Adblocker gratuito contro la pubblicità e i pop-up, per youtube e altri popolari siti web di video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install VideoAdblocker now and all the Pre-Roll Ads on your favorit video sites are gone, forever!

✓ About Permissions & Privacy
like all ad-blocking extensions we need the following permissions to remove ads on embedded videos in any website.
Any video adblock detection happens on your computer and we do not see or track any of your browsing history.
